title: BitcoinPenny
author: BitcoinPenny
created_time: May 09, 2022, 04:33:36 PMLast edit: August 23, 2022, 06:21:03 PM by BitcoinPenny
content: It's time to clear out the last remaining 2018 and 2019 SILVER Short Rolls and SILVER Singles, so we're offering them for the unbelievable SUPER CLEARANCE price of 50% OFF the original list prices! That's some serious silver savings, so stock up while supplies last! Bitcoin Penny® 2018 SILVER Singles x15 @ $29 each*This was our very first year minting Silver coins, so it's a special vintage!Bitcoin Penny® 2018 SILVER Short Rolls Only 1 left! @ $520 each *This was our very first year minting Silver coins, so it's a special vintage!Bitcoin Penny® 2019 SILVER Singles x3 @ $29 each*Be lucky and receive one of our rare Left-Facing Eagle specialty coins minted in a ratio of 1:10!Bitcoin Penny® 2019 SILVER Short Rolls Only 1 left! @ $520 each*Due to the design of our "bulletproof" protective wrapper, both end coins have been exposed to the air and have developed a radiant spot of blue/green/purple/brown patina.**Inside each 2019 Short Roll hides TWO of our rare Left-Facing Eagle specialty coins!The 2018 SILVERSThe 2019 SILVERSPaymentsWe happily accept Bitcoin (BTC), Litecoin (LTC), Ethereum (ETH), and Roocoin (ROO). PayPal may be accepted on an individual member basis upon request. PM to inquire.Please make all BTC payments to the following addresses only: 1TBPCoEc2MYiQtjT4xduZjAqCBjPhTNDh or 3E1D38LZMCptFv2GLH1dkWz6YoHXif9txt.ShippingFREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING!As always, thanks for supporting bitcoin and The Bitcoin Penny company!Regards,Chris@TBPCo. DISCLAIMER: Bitcoin Penny™ Commemorative Coins are for entertainment purposes only. No cash value.

comments.body: 1x 2018 short roll 1x 2019 short roll 1x 2018 single 1x 2019 singleWill PM for payment details. ThanksGeo

comments.body: Inventory quantities have been updated, and PMs will be going out shortly. Thanks, everyone! Regards,Chris@TBPCo.

comments.body: One 2019 short roll please. Message me if I got one so I can send payment. I have limited messages because I am new.

I have limited messages because I am new.The last 2019 Silver Short Roll is all yours, Dustin. Thanks!Still a few Silver Single coins left in stock. Buy them while you can. Chris@TBPCo.
